C16 = 1.67017858435830105053903440232

V0 = ( C15,   C3, -C8)
V1 = (  C2, -C11, -C8)
V2 = (-C16,  0.0, -C8)
V3 = ( -C1,  C10, -C8)
V4 = (  C6, -C12,  C4)
V5 = ( -C0,  C14,  C9)
